verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David; when Nathan the prophet came unto him, after he had gone in to Bath-sheba. Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, according to thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>: According to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> out my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>.
Wash <S%H3526><s%> me <S%H7235>thoroughly<s%> from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, And <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> me from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; And my <S%H2403>sin<s%> is ever before <S%H8548>me<s%>.

Against <S%H2398>thee<s%>, thee only, have I sinned, And <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>; That thou mayest be <S%H6663>justified<s%> when thou <S%H1696>speakest<s%>, And be <S%H2135>clear<s%> when thou <S%H8199>judgest<s%>.
Behold <S%H2342><s%>, I was brought forth in <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; And in <S%H2399>sin<s%> did my <S%H517>mother<s%> conceive <S%H3179>me<s%>.
Behold <S%H2654><s%>, thou desirest <S%H571>truth<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts<s%>; And in the <S%H5640>hidden<s%> part thou wilt make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
Purify <S%H2398><s%> me with <S%H231>hyssop<s%>, and I shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>: <S%H3526>Wash<s%> <S%H3835>me<s%>, and I shall be whiter than <S%H7950>snow<s%>.
Make me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, That the <S%H6106>bones<s%> which thou hast <S%H1794>broken<s%> may <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>.
Hide <S%H5641><s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from my <S%H2399>sins<s%>, And blot <S%H4229>out<s%> all mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
Create <S%H1254><s%> in me a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; And <S%H2318>renew<s%> a <S%H3559>right<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> within <S%H7130>me<s%>.
Cast me not <S%H7993>away<s%> from thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>; And <S%H3947>take<s%> not thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> Spirit from <S%H7307>me<s%>.
Restore <S%H7725><s%> unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; And <S%H5564>uphold<s%> me with a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Then will I <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>; And <S%H2400>sinners<s%> shall be converted unto <S%H7725>thee<s%>.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from <S%H1818>bloodguiltiness<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8668>salvation<s%>; And my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H6605>open<s%> thou my <S%H8193>lips<s%>; And my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall show <S%H5046>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>.
For thou <S%H2654>delightest<s%> not in <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; else would I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7521>it<s%>: Thou hast no pleasure in <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

The <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are a <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: A <S%H7665>broken<s%> and <S%H1794>contrite<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou wilt not <S%H959>despise<s%>.
Do <S%H3190>good<s%> in thy good <S%H7522>pleasure<s%> unto <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H1129>Build<s%> thou the <S%H2346>walls<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then will thou <S%H2654>delight<s%> in the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, In <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and in <S%H3632>whole<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>: Then will they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> upon thine <S%H4196>altar<s%>.
